name: Real-Estate-Predictive-Maintenance-App
description: An AI-Powered app that predicts equipment failures to reduce downtime and optimize maintenance schedules

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Real Estate Predictive Maintenance

Overview

This application is designed to analyze real-time sensor data from building systems and predict maintenance requirements using advanced machine learning techniques. By identifying potential issues early such as abnormal smoke levels or water pressure fluctuations this application empowers facilities management teams to shift from reactive maintenance to a proactive, data-driven approach, thereby minimizing downtime and optimizing resource allocation.

Input

Users provide:

  • + Maintenance type required for targeted analysis, selection of data features to be included during model training

Output

The app delivers:

  • + Detailed data analysis based on chosen maintenance type filters
  • + A trained model and its subsequent validation for effective predictive maintenance
  • + Robust predictive analysis of the trained and validated model

Benefits

  • + Shifts from reactive to proactive maintenance, minimizing unexpected breakdowns and downtime.
  • + Optimizes resource allocation for maintenance teams and spare parts, leading to cost savings.
  • + Extends the lifespan of building systems through timely and targeted interventions.
  • + Enhances occupant safety and comfort by preempting issues like abnormal smoke levels or water pressure fluctuations.

Data Description

Field Name Description
Property_ID Unique identifier for the building/property
Date Date of the recorded sensor data
HVAC_Temp Temperature recorded by the HVAC system (in Â°F)
Water_Pressure Water pressure level in the system (in PSI)
Power_Usage Amount of power consumed on that day (in kWh)
Elevator_Vibration Vibration level of the elevator system (in G-force)
Smoke_Level Smoke sensor reading (in ppm)
Maintenance_Type Type of maintenance required (e.g. Smoke, Water, Elevator)
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html1", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "Columns", "columns": [ { "components": [], "width": 6, "offset": 0, "push": 0, "pull": 0, "size": "md", "currentWidth": 6 }, { "components": [ { "label": "Next", "action": "event", "showValidations": false, "theme": "info", "customClass": " mt-0 float-right rounded", "tableView": false, "key": "getStarted", "type": "button", "event": "next", "input": true } ], "width": 6, "offset": 0, "push": 0, "pull": 0, "size": "md", "currentWidth": 6 } ], "key": "columns", "type": "columns", "input": false, "tableView": false } ] }

      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003ePredictive Maintenance Model Validation\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Enter the name of the model trained previously and press the action button to start model validation.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Trained Model Name \u0026nbsp",
              "placeholder": "Use only alphanumerics and underscores",
              "description": "Enter the name of the model you trained previously",
              "customClass": "ml-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "ModelPredict",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Feature Selection",
              "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
              "inline": true,
              "disabled": true,
              "tableView": false,
              "defaultValue": {
                "HVAC_Temp": true,
                "Water_Pressure": true,
                "Power_Usage": true,
                "Elevator_Vibration": true,
                "Smoke_Level": true
              },
              "values": [

                  "label": "HVAC_Temp",

                  "label": "Water_Pressure\t",

                },

              ],
              "calculateValue": "debugger;\nif(instance.previousData.modelFeaturesData \u0026\u0026 data.ModelPredict){\n  featureData \u003d instance.previousData.modelFeaturesData.filter(res\u003d\u003e{\n    if(res.name \u003d\u003d data.ModelPredict \u0026\u0026 res.path \u003d\u003d data.ModelPredict) {\n        return res;\n    }\n  });\n  value \u003d featureData[0].features;\n}",
              "key": "workflow_16_FEATURECOLUMNS",
              "type": "selectboxes",
              "input": true,
              "inputType": "checkbox"
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,

          "pull": 0,

          "currentWidth": 6
